participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: ambitious and detail-oriented, with a flair for the dramatic.
participant_1.background: i diet a lot. i'm high maintenance. i love listening to britney spears. i like to tan in tanning beds. i love spending money.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: down-to-earth and hard-working, with a strong sense of family values.
participant_2.background: my family has raised horses for generations. i want to be a lawyer. i was raised on a horse farm. i am from a small town.

content.text: do you like to tan   we can tan in tanning beds some day
yes, when i was young we tan every day on our farm at summer
i love to tan all of the time in special shops
ok   what do you do for a living
preparing for final exams, i want to enter lawyer school
what are you studying   i am going to school to be a lawyer
i m too   not much more for me
